text:
"Become a cat for you...what does that even mean?" It's rather clear by the way he drawls out the question, he doesn't much care for the answer and is merely patronizing Shin for asking a question that doesn't even make sense.

They'd been kidnapped by a couple of freaks, that much was certain.

Typically, Choromatsu would've leapt on an opportunity to witness his brother's humiliation. He was the only one that actually seemed to care that they weren't doing anything with their lives and yet everyone always followed Oso's lead instead of his.

"I'd prefer if you let us all go," he states firmly, averting his eyes from the tank.

Daichi's gaze follows Choro's eyes as they glance away from the tank, his hand reaching up to stroke his face.

"Eh, really?" He tilts his head, thumb resting on the NEET's bottom lip. "I don't think so, Choro-kun. Your brothers are really fun to play with, and I'm sure you'll be, too."

His other hand drifts down to his hoodie, grabbing and prodding at his stomach from underneath the fabric.

Shin laughs at Ichi's question, motioning to Karamatsu's mummified form.

"I mean a /pet/, Ichi-kun. Oso-kun and Kara-kun are both pets, so I think you'd make a perfect kitten."

Flipping Kara over on his back, he strokes his cock gently, rubbing the tip with his thumb.
(( if you ever come back, just know that I'll still be here. I won't disconnect, I promise
